title: Next.js Starter Blog
description: Opinions and thoughts on web development, readings, and personal experiences.

items.title: Welcome
items.content_text: Welcome to your new blog built with Next.js - https://nextjs-blog-starter.now.sh/posts/welcome

items.content_text: Here are some code snippets to show you how syntax highlighting works - https://nextjs-blog-starter.now.sh/posts/syntax-highlighting

items.title: Deploy to Now
items.content_text: One of the most amazing things about this project is that you can easily deploy it to Now - https://nextjs-blog-starter.now.sh/posts/deploy-to-now
